thing-type.label: Basic Message Transmitter
thing-type.description: This thing can be used to send messages to any Threema user.

parameter.name: gatewayId
parameter.label: From
parameter.description: The senders Threema ID. Threema Gateway lets you request your personal, custom ID. All IDs that are used on Threema Gateway start with an asterisk (*) and consist of 8 characters in total. Example ID: *THREEMA.

parameter.name: secret
parameter.label: Secret
parameter.description: The private key associated with the senders Threema ID.

parameter.name: recipientIds
parameter.label: To
parameter.description: A list of Threema IDs of recipients to send messages to. (Optional)

channel-type.label: Credits
channel-type.description: The remaining credits to send messages.
